prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek blue skin and large expressive eyes.
Imagine a frog-like creature that can jump high and uses water attacks in battle.
Show me a Pokemon that blends into aquatic environments with a smooth, streamlined body.
Design a bipedal Pokemon with webbed feet and a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in wetland habitats and has a unique color pattern.
Make a creature with both agility and a powerful water-based combat style.
Give me a Pokemon with a distinctive fin-like feature that enhances its swimming abilities.
